site.name: Woori Acupuncture
site.description: Professional acupuncture and traditional Korean herbal medicine services in Riverside, California. Treating menstrual cramps, acne, anxiety, pain management, arthritis, Parkinson's, menopause, infertility, digestive disorders, stroke recovery, diabetes, high blood pressure, weight management, skin issues, and insomnia.
site.keywords: acupuncture, Korean medicine, herbal medicine, pain relief, traditional medicine, Riverside CA, natural healing, wellness, holistic health, menstrual cramps, acne treatment, anxiety relief, arthritis treatment, Parkinson's disease, menopause, infertility, digestive disorders, stroke recovery, Bell's palsy, diabetes, high blood pressure, weight management, skin conditions, insomnia, Crohn's disease

hero.title: Woori Acupuncture
hero.subtitle: Restore Your Health with Traditional Korean Medicine & Modern Acupuncture

acupuncture.title: Traditional Acupuncture Therapy
acupuncture.description: Experience authentic traditional acupuncture for effective pain relief and overall health improvement through precise needle placement at specific therapeutic acupoints. Our licensed practitioners use sterile, single-use needles for safe and effective treatment.

herbal.title: Korean Herbal Medicine
herbal.description: Receive personalized herbal prescriptions using time-tested traditional Korean medicine principles for comprehensive treatment. Our custom herbal formulas target the root cause of health issues for lasting wellness.

menstrualCramps.title: Menstrual Cramps
menstrualCramps.description: Targeted acupuncture treatment for menstrual pain relief and regulation of menstrual cycle disorders.

acneTreatment.title: Acne Treatment
acneTreatment.description: Holistic approach to skin health using acupuncture and herbal medicine to address root causes of acne.

holisticHealing.title: Holistic Mind & Body Healing
holisticHealing.description: Comprehensive treatment addressing both mental and physical wellness through traditional Korean medicine.

anxiety.title: Anxiety
anxiety.description: Natural anxiety relief through acupuncture and herbal treatments to restore mental balance and calm.

painManagement.title: Pain Management
painManagement.description: Effective pain relief for chronic and acute conditions using traditional acupuncture techniques.

arthritis.title: Arthritis, Muscle & Joint Pain
arthritis.description: Specialized treatment for inflammatory conditions and musculoskeletal pain relief.

parkinsons.title: Parkinson's Disease
parkinsons.description: Supportive care for Parkinson's symptoms using acupuncture to improve quality of life.

menopause.title: Women's Menopause
menopause.description: Natural menopause symptom management through traditional Korean medicine approaches.

infertility.title: Infertility
infertility.description: Fertility support using acupuncture and herbal medicine to enhance reproductive health.

prostatic.title: Prostatic Disorder
prostatic.description: Treatment for prostate-related conditions using traditional medicine techniques.

digestive.title: Digestive System Disorder
digestive.description: Comprehensive treatment for digestive issues including stomach, intestinal, and bowel disorders.

crohns.title: Crohn's Disease
crohns.description: Supportive care for inflammatory bowel disease using acupuncture and herbal treatments.

stroke.title: Stroke
stroke.description: Post-stroke rehabilitation support through acupuncture to aid recovery and improve function.

bellsPalsy.title: Bell's Palsy
bellsPalsy.description: Facial nerve paralysis treatment using specialized acupuncture techniques for recovery.

diabetes.title: Diabetes
diabetes.description: Complementary treatment for diabetes management through traditional Korean medicine.

highBloodPressure.title: High Blood Pressure
highBloodPressure.description: Natural approaches to blood pressure management using acupuncture and lifestyle guidance.

weightManagement.title: Weight Management
weightManagement.description: Holistic weight management program combining acupuncture, herbal medicine, and dietary guidance.

skinIssues.title: Skin Issues
skinIssues.description: Treatment for various skin conditions including eczema, psoriasis, and other dermatological issues.

insomnia.title: Insomnia
insomnia.description: Natural sleep disorder treatment using acupuncture and herbal medicine for better rest.

about.title: About Woori Acupuncture - Your Trusted Korean Medicine Clinic
about.content1: Woori Acupuncture combines authentic traditional Korean medicine with modern therapeutic techniques to provide the highest quality care for our patients in Riverside, California. With years of experience and specialized training, we offer personalized treatments tailored to each patient's individual condition for fundamental health recovery and long-term wellness.
about.content2: Our holistic approach focuses on treating the root cause of health issues rather than just managing symptoms, promoting natural healing processes and sustainable wellness. We are committed to helping you achieve optimal health through time-tested traditional methods.

contact.title: Contact Woori Acupuncture - Schedule Your Appointment
contact.hours:
Monday-Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Saturday: 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM
Sunday: Closed

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Healing Journey?
cta.description: Contact Woori Acupuncture today to schedule your consultation and learn how traditional Korean medicine can help with {condition}.
